name: Calm Cards - Freecell
description:
Calm Cards - FreeCell has a meditative quality to it and helps you to slow down. Keep your mind off other things for a while, recharge your energy and regain your focus.

The game contains:

  • Beautiful and smooth animations
  • Animated sky background
  • Relaxing music 
  • Soothing sounds of birds
  • Traditional or enlarged card illustrations

The game is free from:

  • Ads
  • In-app purchases
  • Leaderboards
  • Stress
